text.__SUMMARY__: Strioturbonilla sigmoidea is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Distribution:
This marine species occurs in the following locations:
Angola
Atlantic Europe
European waters (ERMS scope)
Mediterranean Sea
Morocco
Portuguese Exclusive Economic Zone
Spanish Exclusive Economic Zone
United Kingdom Exclusive Economic Zone
West Africa
